PROMPTSETXUI.XUIEDITOR:
<dialog height="506" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="279" top="4" width="420"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Parameters"><properties><entry name="text">Parameters</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_PKG_NAMEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Package name" tooltip="A package designation by its instance. An instance can be the package abbreviation or a specific instance (for example, inst.1 or inst.2). All instances of a package can be requested by inst.*. If you leave the parameter empty, all packages are returned (you may hovewer filter them by category, architecture etc. See parameters below.)" upper="0" required="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Package name</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_PKG_NAMEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">A package designation by its instance. An instance can be the package abbreviation or a specific instance (for example, inst.1 or inst.2). All instances of a package can be requested by inst.*. If you leave the parameter empty, all packages are returned (you may hovewer filter them by category, architecture etc. See parameters below.)</entry><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_FILTER_BY_CATs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Filter by category" tooltip="Display packages that match a category. If more than one category is supplied, the package needs to match only one category in the list. The match is not case specific. Example: system,application" upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Filter by category</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_FILTER_BY_CATs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Display packages that match a category. If more than one category is supplied, the package needs to match only one category in the list. The match is not case specific.
Example: system,application</entry><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_FILTER_BY_ARCHs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Filter by architecture" tooltip="Display packages matching a specific architecture. Only one entry possible." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Filter by architecture</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_FILTER_BY_ARCHs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Display packages matching a specific architecture. Only one entry possible.</entry><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_SW_DEVICEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Software device" tooltip="Defines a device, device, on which the software resides. device can be an absolute directory pathname or the identifiers for tape, floppy disk, removable disk, and so forth. The special token spool may be used to indicate the default installation spool directory (/var/spool/pkg)." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Software device</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_SW_DEVICEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Defines a device, device, on which the software resides. device can be an absolute directory pathname or the identifiers for tape, floppy disk, removable disk, and so forth. The special token spool may be used to indicate the default installation spool directory (/var/spool/pkg).</entry><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_SEARCH_FILTERs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Package filter" tooltip=" all: Display information for all packages (no option at command line) only fully installed packages: Display information for fully installed packages only. (-i option at command line) only partially installed packages: Display information for partially installed packages only. (-p option at command line)" alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC4_RV.PM_SOLARIS.QUERY_FILTER</entry><entry name="text">Package filter</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_SEARCH_FILTERs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip"> all: Display information for all packages (no option at command line)
only fully installed packages: Display information for fully installed packages only. (-i option at command line)
only partially installed packages: Display information for partially installed packages only. (-p option at command line)</entry><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="customfield"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_OUTPUT_FORMATs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Output format" tooltip=" category, package, description: lists the primary category, package instance, and the names of all completely installed and partially installed packages. It displays one line for each package selected. (Impl. note: no formatting option at the command line) package abbreviation, package name, architecture, version: Designate an extracted listing of package information. The listing contains the package abbreviation, package name, package architecture (if available) and package version (if available). (Implementation note: use the option -x at command line.)" alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC4_RV.PM_SOLARIS.QUERY_OUTPUT</entry><entry name="text">Output format</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_OUTPUT_FORMATs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip"> category, package, description: lists the primary category, package instance, and the names of all completely installed and partially installed packages. It displays one line for each package selected. (Impl. note: no formatting option at the command line)
package abbreviation, package name, architecture, version: Designate an extracted listing of package information. The listing contains the package abbreviation, package name, package architecture (if available) and package version (if available). (Implementation note: use the option -x at command line.)</entry><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="customfield"/></properties></dynradiogroup></readpanel></dialog>

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_PKG_NAMEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_PKG_NAME#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_PKG_NAMEs.00><UC4RB_FILTER_BY_CATs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_FILTER_BY_CAT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_FILTER_BY_CATs.00><UC4RB_FILTER_BY_ARCHs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_FILTER_BY_ARCH#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_FILTER_BY_ARCHs.00><UC4RB_SW_DEVICEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SW_DEVICE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SW_DEVICEs.00><UC4RB_SEARCH_FILTERs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SEARCH_FILTER#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">all</UC4RB_SEARCH_FILTERs.00><UC4RB_OUTPUT_FORMATs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_OUTPUT_FORMAT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">category, package, description</UC4RB_OUTPUT_FORMATs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>
